title: The NRA Is Racist, Don Jr. Needs Cash 6.4.21
itunes:title: The NRA Is Racist, Don Jr. Needs Cash 6.4.21
description:
In episode 923, Jack and Miles are joined by comedian and Bitchuation Room host Francesca Fiorentini to discuss Biden's new strategy in Senate, the Trump's joining cameo, the truth behind the constitutional right to bare arms, athletes' mental health, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Biden tries new strategy with moderates as frustration grows
  2. Sinema on why she skipped vote on Jan. 6 commission: 'I had a personal family matter'
  3. Donald Trump Jr. joins Cameo
  4. Was the Constitutional Right to Bear Arms Designed to Protect Slavery?
  5. Naomi Osaka's withdrawal throws athletes' mental health into sports spotlight
  6. LISTEN: The Gap Band - Outstanding

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
